name: Refrigerator
details: A large appliance used to keep food and beverages cold.

name: Washing Machine
details: An appliance used to wash clothes automatically.

name: Microwave Oven
details: A kitchen appliance used to heat and cook food quickly using microwaves.

name: Dishwasher
details: An appliance used to automatically clean dishes and utensils.

name: Air Conditioner
details: An appliance used to cool and dehumidify indoor air.

name: Vacuum Cleaner
details: An appliance used to clean floors and carpets by suction.

name: Toaster
details: A small appliance used to toast slices of bread.

name: Coffee Maker
details: An appliance used to brew coffee automatically.

name: Blender
details: A kitchen appliance used to mix, pur√©e, or emulsify food and other substances.

name: Electric Kettle
details: An appliance used to boil water quickly.
